subject: Basketball (College)
Television
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Bill Raftery proved that he belonged as the lead analyst for the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament over the past few weeks, but Grant Hill, his rookie partner, still has much to prove.
snippet: Bill Raftery proved that he belonged as the lead analyst for the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament over the past few weeks, but Grant Hill, his rookie partner, still has much to prove.
